price: Musa abwira abantu be ati “Mwiyambaze Allah kandi mwihangane. Mu by’ukuri isi ni iya Allah; ayiraga uwo ashaka mu bagaragu be. Kandi iherezo ryiza ni iry’abagandukira (Allah).”
arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla mūsā liqawmihi is'taʿīnū bil-lahi wa-iṣ'birū inna al-arḍa lillahi yūrithuhā man yashāu min ʿibādihi wal-ʿāqibatu lil'muttaqīna
